page.title: 15THE SCHOOL FIELD
page.content: In Magor,safe recreation areas are not very easy to find,but when a child wants to go and play in a park,our school is the best place to go and can provide many hours of pleasure. On the school field campus there are many amenities stones,two sets of swings,hurdles and various other things. There are not many places in Magor to play football but the school field has a set of goal posts so all of Magor's budding footballers go there to play.Everyone goes over to the field to play many games or just to wait until your friends arrive,as it is a good place to meet. The school field is also a very safe place to ride BMX bikes,the children ride up and down the steep banks around the field ,but it's also fun just to follow the lines of the pitch.
